text: 23.34 Sng 22.18, Ais 53.12, Mat 5.44, Apo 3.17, 7.60 Jisas nop anɨgɨl pak tɨbɨk lel, ne God nop agɨl agak, Bapi. Yɨp tap anɨb gebal ak nɨgtep gɨl ma gebal agak. Anɨb ak tap si tap tɨmel gebal ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen kɨli Jisas nop mab bak alaŋ pak tɨbɨk lɨl, chech nop tɨg asɨk dɨl, sadu tek gɨl keke dɨlak.
